body:
Comment 2 by **piotrnar**: 
I think "the bug disappeared", because when you move the C files, they get compiled into
objects and the library is not actually used.
If you build the .o files outside the folder and tell cgo to link such an ".o" files,
instead of the ".a", this problem also does not appear.

It would not be a big deal, if not for a fact that people (like me) often want to link
some bigger lib - i.e. openssl, or gmp, and then it juts does not work.
